Uses of Package
org.hps.minuit

  • Packages that use org.hps.minuit 
    Package Description
    org.hps.minuit  
    org.hps.recon.tracking
    Track reconstruction framework
  • Classes in org.hps.minuit used by org.hps.minuit 
    Class and Description
    CombinedMinimizer 
    CombinedMinimumBuilder 
    ContoursError 
    DavidonErrorUpdator 
    FCNBase
    User function base class, has to be implemented by the user.
    FCNGradientBase
    Extension of FCNBase for providing the analytical gradient of the function.
    FunctionGradient 
    FunctionMinimum
    Result of the minimization.
    FunctionMinimum.MnAboveMaxEdm 
    FunctionMinimum.MnReachedCallLimit 
    GradientCalculator 
    MatrixInversionException 
    MinimumBuilder 
    MinimumError
    MinimumError keeps the inverse 2nd derivative (inverse Hessian) used for calculating the parameter step size (-V*g) and for the covariance update (ErrorUpdator).
    MinimumError.MnHesseFailed 
    MinimumError.MnInvertFailed 
    MinimumError.MnMadePosDef 
    MinimumError.MnNotPosDef 
    MinimumErrorUpdator 
    MinimumParameters 
    MinimumSeed 
    MinimumSeedGenerator
    base class for seed generators (starting values); the seed generator prepares initial starting values from the input (MnUserParameterState) for the minimization;
    MinimumState
    MinimumState keeps the information (position, gradient, 2nd deriv, etc) after one minimization step (usually in MinimumBuilder).
    MinosError 
    MinuitParameter 
    MnAlgebraicSymMatrix 
    MnAlgebraicVector 
    MnApplication
    Base class for minimizers.
    MnCross 
    MnCross.CrossFcnLimit 
    MnCross.CrossNewMin 
    MnCross.CrossParLimit 
    MnFcn 
    MnGlobalCorrelationCoeff 
    MnMachinePrecision
    Determines the relative floating point arithmetic precision.
    MnParabola
    parabola = a*xx + b*x + c
    MnParabolaPoint 
    MnSeedGenerator 
    MnStrategy
    API class for defining three levels of strategies: low (0), medium (1), high (>=2).
    MnUserCovariance
    MnUserCovariance is the external covariance matrix designed for the interaction of the user.
    MnUserParameters
    API class for the user interaction with the parameters.
    MnUserParameterState
    The class MnUserParameterState contains the MnUserParameters and the MnUserCovariance.
    MnUserTransformation
    knows how to transform between user specified parameters (external) and internal parameters used for minimization
    ModularFunctionMinimizer 
    Pair 
    Point
    A class representing a pair of double (x,y) or (lower,upper)
    ScanBuilder
    Performs a minimization using the simplex method of Nelder and Mead (ref.
    ScanMinimizer 
    SimplexBuilder 
    SimplexMinimizer 
    SimplexSeedGenerator 
    SinParameterTransformation
    $
    SqrtLowParameterTransformation
    duns $
    SqrtUpParameterTransformation
    duns $
    VariableMetricBuilder 
    VariableMetricEDMEstimator 
    VariableMetricMinimizer
